sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const NewProjectModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, onSave }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', client: '', description: '', type: 'residential', startDate: '', currency: 'EUR' }); const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(1); const totalSteps = 2; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSave(formData); onClose(); }; const nextStep = () => { setCurrentStep(prev => Math.min(prev + 1, totalSteps)); }; const prevStep = () => { setCurrentStep(prev => Math.max(prev - 1, 1)); }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (
